search.fit: *|outlier sigma(FF_日志等级.keyword_count) method=std para=1 windows=1 as result by 3
search.outline: transform field(日志等级.keyword_count) by 3|distribution normal(日志等级.keyword_count) by 3
search.query: *|bucket datehistorgram(@timestamp) interval=1m timezone='Asia/Shanghai' mindoccount=1 as 3|stats count(日志等级.keyword) as 日志等级.keyword_count by 3
